movie.title: Landless
movie.description_intro: An insight into the Brazilian Landless Workers Movement's everyday routine, which is divided up between tilling the land, political activism and talk of what a better future might look like.
movie.description_full: An insight into the Brazilian Landless Workers Movement's everyday routine, which is divided up between tilling the land, political activism and talk of what a better future might look like.

movies.title: Live from Space
movies.summary: National Geographic and NASA are sending you into space - live! For the first time ever, board the International Space Station and take a complete orbit of Earth in real time.
movies.description_full: National Geographic and NASA are sending you into space - live! For the first time ever, board the International Space Station and take a complete orbit of Earth in real time.
movies.synopsis: National Geographic and NASA are sending you into space - live! For the first time ever, board the International Space Station and take a complete orbit of Earth in real time.

movies.title: Ruin and Rose
movies.summary: A surreal future leaves the world without water and consumed by sand: the Big Empty. A group of children survives alone on the edge of the endless desert in the ruin of the now. When a young boy unearths an ancient relic hinting at the lost wonders of winter, he sets off in search of the ghosts that once called the mountains their home. This bold cinematic experience balances stunning skiing with a wild and hopeful journey into the forgotten lands of myth and magic beyond the Empty. Acclaimed writer/director Ben Sturgulewski joins the award-winning team at Matchstick Productions and their two decades of filmmaking expertise to deliver "RUIN AND ROSE," an epic creative vision brought to life by the talents of the world's top skiers. Winter landscapes across the planet contrast seamlessly with a thoroughly-crafted story of environmental apocalypse, shot entirely within the otherworldly expanses of Africa's Skeleton Coast. Unlike anything seen before, the dreamlike setting of this film ...

movies.title: December
movies.summary: In January, a couple walks downtown at dawn. Is this a love story? Situations following after 'February' and 'March' put audiences in confusion. An intriguing narrative structure built on twisting time and converting relationships.
movies.description_full: In January, a couple walks downtown at dawn. Is this a love story? Situations following after 'February' and 'March' put audiences in confusion. An intriguing narrative structure built on twisting time and converting relationships.

movies.title: Liverpool FC: The 30-Year Wait
movies.summary: A look at the story of Liverpool's quest to return to the top of English football by winning the Premier League.
movies.description_full: A look at the story of Liverpool's quest to return to the top of English football by winning the Premier League.
movies.synopsis: A look at the story of Liverpool's quest to return to the top of English football by winning the Premier League.
